title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Department of Meteorology says that showers or thundershowers will occur in Western, Central, Sabaragamuwa, Southern, Uva and North-western provinces during the evening or night.

title: USS Michael Murphy arrives in Colombo
byline: USS Michael Murphy of the United States Navy had arrived at the port of Colombo on a replenishment visit on Saturday, Sri Lanka Navy said.

title: Eight killed in second mass attack in China this week
byline: A former student went on a stabbing rampage at a vocational college in eastern China on Saturday, killing eight people and injuring 17 others, police said, just days after the deadliest mass killing in the country in a decade shocked Chinese society.

title: IMF team to visit Sri Lanka today for third review under EFF program
byline: A team from the International Monetary Fund (IMF), led by the Senior Mission Chief for Sri Lanka Peter Breuer, will be in Colombo from November 17 to 23.

title: Sri Lanka’s new Cabinet to be sworn in tomorrow
byline: The Cabinet Ministers of the new government will be sworn in before President Anura Kumara Dissanayake at 10.00 a.m. tomorrow (Nov. 18) at the Presidential Secretariat in Colombo, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.

title: Victoria Kjær Theilvig of Denmark is crowned the 73rd Miss Universe
byline: Victoria Kjær Theilvig of Denmark has been crowned Miss Universe.

title: Special train services for commuters returning to Colombo
byline: The Department of Railways has announced that special train services will be in operation today (17) and tomorrow (18), for the commuters returning to work after the 2024 General Election leave and the long weekend.

title: Xi says he will work with Trump in last meeting with Biden
byline: Chinese leader Xi Jinping has pledged to work with incoming President Donald Trump in his final meeting with current US leader Joe Biden.

title: Accomplice of ‘‘Badowita Asanka’ arrested with drugs
byline: An accomplice of the notorious underworld criminal figure and large-scale drug trafficker infamously known as “Badowita Asanka” has been arrested by the Police Special Task Force (STF) along with a stock of heroin.

title: Dilith Jayaweera to enter Parliament through ‘Sarvajana Balaya’ national list
byline: The ‘Sarvajana Balaya’ alliance has decided to nominate the leader of the alliance and Gampaha District parliamentary candidate Dilith Jayaweera as an MP through the party’s National List, the General Secretary of ‘Sarvajana Balaya’ Ranjan Seneviratne said.

title: NPP reveals its 18 National List MPs
byline: The National People’s Power (NPP) has announced the names nominated to fill the 18 National List MP seats won by the party in the 2024 parliamentary election.

title: ITAK’s General Secretary nominated for National List seat
byline: The Ilankai Thamil Arasu Kachchi (ITAK) has nominated its General Secretary Dr. P. Sathiyalingam to enter the Parliament as the party’s National List MP.

title: Sri Lanka’s tenth Parliament to welcome over 150 fresh faces as MPs
byline: The 2024 parliamentary election has marked a historic shift in Sri Lanka’s legislature, with nearly 150 out of the 196 elected Members of Parliament (MPs) being newcomers.
